item.title: I need help fixing str xp glitch anyone?
item.dc:creator: @OMG_its_NICK OMG its NICK
item.description:
@OMG_its_NICK wrote:

okay i dont know what to do here. on my server when ever i used attk str and def it would give 1k per kill and it would train all 3… i fixed attk and def but it wont work for str. I want it to give 100xp per hit… This is the code i have atm for my stats can anyone tell me whats wrong?

        if (FightType != 2) {
            TotalExp = (double) (100 * hitDiff);
            TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
            addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerStrength);
        if (FightType != 3) {
            TotalExp = (double) (100 * hitDiff);
            TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
            addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerDefence);
        if (FightType != 1) {
            TotalExp = (double) (100 * hitDiff);
            TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
            addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerAttack);

Read full topic
item.source: I need help fixing str xp glitch anyone?
